description.value:
Death is the trigger for the true virulence of this poisonous purplish fluid.

Alchemical Item: Common

Power âœ¦ Consumable (Standard Action)

Attack: Ranged 5/10 (one creature); the item's level + 3 vs. Fortitude

Hit: The target takes ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).

Level 15 or 20: Ongoing 10 poison damage (save ends).

Level 25 or 30: Ongoing 15 poison damage (save ends).

Aftereffect: The target takes ongoing 1 poison damage (save ends).

Level 15 or 20: Ongoing 2 poison damage (save ends).

Level 25 or 30: Ongoing 3 poison damage (save ends).

Effect: If the target drops below 1 hit point while still taking ongoing damage from this power, make a secondary attack.

Secondary Attack: Close burst 1 centered on the primary target (each creature in the burst); the item's level + 3 vs. Reflex

Hit: 1d8 necrotic damage.

Level 15 or 20: 2d8 necrotic damage.

Level 25 or 30: 3d8 necrotic damage.
